data.name: UIC Events
data.description: A web app that consolidates UIC event data from multiple sources with calendar syncing, built using React, FastAPI, and MongoDB.

data.name: hi Feelings - iOS App
data.description: An emotional well-being journaling app built with Swift and UIKit, featuring scheduled letters.

data.name: GoFundMe Campaign Analysis
data.description: Analyzed 44K cancer crowdfunding campaigns using Python to identify key features and emotional cues for predicting success.

data.name: LLAMA & Mistral Fine-Tuning
data.description: Fine-tuned LLaMA and Mistral models on 54K Reddit posts to improve classification of mental health conditions using supervised learning.

data.name: Chicago Bird Diversity
data.description: A data science project analyzing bird diversity across Chicago neighborhoods using eBird data and Shannon Index, with predictive modeling of future diversity trends.

data.name: Lord Krishna Voice Clips from Mahabharat
data.description: The project automates the extraction and preparation of Lord Krishna's voice clips from the Mahabharat serial. The system uses the Telegram API for video acquisition, moviepy (Python) for segmenting, and Google's Translate and Transcription APIs to create relevant titles and descriptions for each clip
